trans-unit.source: 1) Teach git the explicit way by editing the global config (my original answer):
trans-unit.target: 1)通过编辑全局配置(我的原始答案)来教git的显式方法。

trans-unit.source: 2) Or if you like a shortcut to teach git a shortcut, as recently commented by Adrien:
trans-unit.target: 2)或者,如果你喜欢捷径,可以教给git一个捷径,就像最近Adrien评论的那样。

trans-unit.source: Sidenote: If you want to turn references (branches and tags) into SHA-1, there is git show-ref and git for-each-ref.
trans-unit.target: 旁注：如果要将引用（分支和标签）转换为SHA-1，则可以使用 git show-ref 和 git for-each-ref 。

trans-unit.source: <sup>You need to run above command in your git root folder.</sup>
trans-unit.target: <sup><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您需要在git根文件夹中运行以上命令。</font></font></sup>

trans-unit.source: Abbreviated commit hash
trans-unit.target: 缩写的提交哈希

trans-unit.source: Another one, using git log:
trans-unit.target: 另一个,使用git日志。

trans-unit.source: Basically, git stores the location of HEAD in .git/HEAD, in the form ref: {path from .git}. This command reads that out, slices off the "ref: ", and reads out whatever file it pointed to.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，git以 ref: {path from .git} 的形式将HEAD的位置存储在.git / HEAD中。该命令将其读出，切出“ ref：”，并读出其指向的任何文件。

trans-unit.source: Click here for more git show examples.
trans-unit.target: 单击此处以获取更多 git show 示例。

trans-unit.source: Commit hash
trans-unit.target: 承诺哈希

trans-unit.source: Example output:
trans-unit.target: 输出示例:

trans-unit.source: Explanation: describes (using annotated tags) the current commit, but only with tags containing "NOT A TAG". Since tags cannot have spaces, this never matches a tag and since we want to show a result --always, the command falls back displaying the full (--abbrev=0) sha1 of the commit and it appends an asterisk if the working directory is --dirty.
trans-unit.target: 说明：描述（使用带注释的标签）当前提交，但仅使用包含“ NOT A TAG”的标签。由于标签不能有空格，因此它永远不会与标签匹配，并且由于我们希望显示结果 --always ，该命令将回退以显示提交的完整（ --abbrev=0 ）sha1，并且如果工作目录在目录后附加星号是 --dirty 。

trans-unit.source: Following up on the accepted answer, here are two ways to set this up:
trans-unit.target: 跟踪已接受的答案，以下是两种设置方法：

trans-unit.source: For completeness, since no-one has suggested it yet. .git/refs/heads/master is a file that contains only one line: the hash of the latest commit on master. So you could just read it from there.
trans-unit.target: 为了完整起见，因为没有人建议过。 .git/refs/heads/master 是仅包含一行的文件： master 上最新提交的哈希。因此，您可以从那里阅读它。

trans-unit.source: From here on, use git lastcommit to show the last commit's hash.
trans-unit.target: 从这里开始，使用 git lastcommit 显示最后一次提交的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Further, using %H is another way to get the long hash.
trans-unit.target: 进一步说,使用%H是另一种获得长哈希的方法。

trans-unit.source: Here is another direct-access implementation:
trans-unit.target: 这里是另一个直接访问的实现方式。

trans-unit.target: 这里有另一种方法:)

trans-unit.target: 下面是Bash shell中的单行本,使用直接从git文件中读取的单行本。

trans-unit.target: 这里有一个内衬是这样的。

trans-unit.source: How can I easily retrieve the hash from the current commit from Git?
trans-unit.target: 如何从Git中轻松获取当前提交的哈希?

trans-unit.source: How to retrieve the hash for the current commit in Git
trans-unit.target: 如何在Git中检索当前提交的哈希值?

trans-unit.source: However, I would also like to store the identifier of the Git commit (the hash) into a custom TFS workitem field. This way I can examine a workitem in TFS and see what Git changesets are associated with the workitem.
trans-unit.target: 但是,我还想把 Git 提交的标识符(哈希)存储到一个自定义的 TFS 工作项字段中。这样我就可以在 TFS 中检查一个工作项,并查看与该工作项相关联的 Git 修改集。

trans-unit.source: I already wrote a tool (using a hook from Git) in which I can inject workitemidentifiers into the message of a Git changeset.
trans-unit.target: 我已经写了一个工具(使用Git中的一个钩子),在这个工具中,我可以将workitemidentifier注入到Git更改集的消息中。

trans-unit.source: I needed something a little more different: display the full sha1 of the commit, but append an asterisk to the end if the working directory is not clean. Unless I wanted to use multiple commands, none of the options in the previous answers work.
trans-unit.target: 我需要的是更多不同的东西:显示提交的完整的sha1,但如果工作目录不干净,就在最后加上一个星号。除非我想使用多个命令,否则前面的答案中的选项都不能用。

trans-unit.source: I would like to retain (for now) the ability to link Git changesets to workitems stored in TFS.
trans-unit.target: 我想保留(暂时)将Git更改集与存储在TFS中的工作项目链接起来的能力。

trans-unit.source: If won't work, check in .git/refs/heads folder what kind of heads do you have present.
trans-unit.target: 如果不起作用，请在 .git/refs/heads 文件夹中检查您有什么样的头。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to append the asterisk, this works like all the other commands in the previous answers:
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想附加星号,这个功能和前面答案中的其他命令一样。

trans-unit.source: If you have windows then you may consider using wsl.exe:
trans-unit.target: 如果你有windows,那么你可以考虑使用wsl.exe。

trans-unit.target: 如果你只想要缩短的哈希。

trans-unit.target: 如果你想要一个特定数字的哈希数,你可以添加。

trans-unit.target: 如果你想用超级黑客的方式来做。

trans-unit.source: If you're going for speed though, the approach mentioned by Deestan
trans-unit.target: 如果您追求速度，Deestan提到的方法

trans-unit.source: It's very similar to the of @outofculture though a bit shorter.
trans-unit.target: 这和@outofculture的文章很相似,虽然短了一点。

trans-unit.source: Note that git now supports storing some head refs in the pack-ref file instead of as a file in the /refs/heads/ folder. https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/git-pack-refs.html
trans-unit.target: 注意，git现在支持将一些head refs存储在pack-ref文件中，而不是作为/ refs / heads /文件夹中的文件存储。 https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/git-pack-refs.html

trans-unit.source: On git bash, simply run $ git log -1
trans-unit.target: 在git bash上,只需运行$ git log -1

trans-unit.source: Perhaps you want an alias so you don't have to remember all the nifty details. After doing one of the below steps, you will be able to simply type:
trans-unit.target: 也许你想要一个别名,这样你就不必记住所有的细节。在做完下面的一个步骤后,你就可以简单地打字了。

trans-unit.source: Result: f5366ccb21588c0d7a5f7d9fa1d3f85e9f9d1ffe*
trans-unit.target: 结果： f5366ccb21588c0d7a5f7d9fa1d3f85e9f9d1ffe*

trans-unit.source: The most succinct way I know:
trans-unit.target: 这是我知道的最简洁的方法。

trans-unit.source: There's always git describe as well. By default it gives you --
trans-unit.target: 总是有 git describe 。默认情况下，它为您提供-

trans-unit.source: This also works over http which is useful for local package archives (I know: for public web sites it's not recommended to make the .git directory accessable):
trans-unit.target: 这也可以通过http来实现,这对于本地包存档是很有用的(我知道:对于公共网站来说,不建议让.git目录可以访问)。

trans-unit.source: This method can be useful when you've repository files, but git command has been not installed.
trans-unit.target: 当您拥有存储库文件但尚未安装 git 命令时，此方法很有用。

trans-unit.source: This value may be used to git checkout later but it becomes pointing to its SHA. To make it to point to the actual current branch by its name do:
trans-unit.target: 这个值可能会在以后用于 git checkout,但它会变成指向它的 SHA。要使其指向当前分支的实际分支,可以用它的名字来做。

trans-unit.source: This, of course, will fail in detached-head mode, as HEAD won't be "ref:...", but the hash itself - but you know, I don't think you expect that much smarts in your bash one-liners. If you don't think semicolons are cheating, though...
trans-unit.target: 当然,这在detached-head模式下会失败,因为head不会是 "ref:...........",而是hash本身--但你知道,我想你对你的bash单行本中的聪明才智期望不高。如果你不觉得分号是作弊的话.....。

trans-unit.target: 为了获得完整的SHA。

trans-unit.target: 为了获得简略版。

trans-unit.source: To turn arbitrary extended object reference into SHA-1, use simply git-rev-parse, for example
trans-unit.target: 要将任意扩展对象引用转换为SHA-1，例如，只需使用git-rev-parse

trans-unit.target: Update:

trans-unit.source: Use git rev-list --max-count=1 HEAD
trans-unit.target: 使用 git rev-list --max-count=1 HEAD
